intro: Quiabentia verticillata, commonly known as the spiral leaf vine, is a tropical climbing plant characterized by its distinctive whorled arrangement of leaves. Quiabentia verticillata is often used in ornamental horticulture due to its unique foliage and adaptability to humid environments.
